Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kostner
ShortDescription: #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Ogden, Cicero, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kostner, Ogden, Cicero, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
